supercaveadventure.rooms

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • supercaveadventure.rooms.Room
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Room00, Room01, Room02, Room03

    public abstract class Room
extends Object
implements Drawable
    Rooms are small levels that contain enemies and other entities.

        public void createStaircaseIfWinConditionReached(boolean winCondition,
                                        Staircase newStaircase)
        Checks if winCondition has been reached and adds a staircase to the game if winCondition has been met.
        Parameters:
        winCondition - Condition to be fulfilled before winning this room.
        newStaircase - The staircase to the next room.
